positions.title: Technical Business Analyst Intern
achievements: Created comprehensive documentation and diagrams (e.g., Activity, Data Flow, Sequence, Use Case, and Entity Relationship Diagrams) to bridge communication gaps among developers, managers, and clients.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document business requirements, ensuring alignment with development goals and app functionality.
Supported white-label app customization by documenting and analyzing differences in components, workflows, and functionalities for external clients.
Developed artifacts tailored to diverse audiences, providing both high-level overviews for management and detailed technical specifications for developers.

positions.title: Open Source Developer
achievements: Actively contributing to multiple open-source projects, including the BigCapital project, where I develop features and enhance financial technology solutions.
Writing clean, efficient code across a variety of platforms, leveraging modern technologies and frameworks to solve complex problems.
Identifying and resolving bugs, optimizing performance, and enhancing the scalability of software solutions across different projects.
Participating in discussions, proposing new ideas, and helping onboard new contributors to foster growth within the open-source community.
Continuously learning and applying best practices in software development to deliver innovative and reliable solutions.

positions.title: Technical Business Analyst
achievements: Spearheaded software modernization at the Central Bank of Colombia, improving operational efficiency by 30% and system reliability by 25%.
Led a team of 15 engineers and provided 24/7 technical support, reducing system downtime by 35% and ensuring seamless critical system operations.
Analyzed and designed software requirements using Java, Angular, and SQL, increasing business alignment.
Developed PowerApps and SAP Business Objects reports, enhancing data accessibility by 30%.
Ensured regulatory compliance and led initiatives that streamlined workflows by 25% and boosted performance by 30%.

positions.title: Software Engineer

Implemented Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by 40%.

Optimized SQL queries, boosting response times by 30%.
Improved user experience and customer satisfaction through cross-functional collaboration.

positions.title: Junior Software Engineer
achievements: Developed full-stack solutions using Java, JavaScript, Angular, SQL, and Docker.
